prompts: Create a Pokemon that resembles a cluster of eggs with pink and white patterns.
Design a Pokemon with a peaceful nature, living in lush forests and meadows.
Generate a cute, round-shaped Pokemon that loves to gather in sunny fields.
Imagine a group of small, egg-like creatures that can communicate through telepathy.
Make a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful psychic type from a simple egg form.
Show me a playful Pokemon that enjoys rolling around in grassy areas.
I want a Pokemon that has a calm demeanor, often found near water sources.
